entities.name: SYSTRAN SAS
entities.description: A company known for 'beyond language' solutions, which also provides and manages IT systems and communication tools for its employees, as detailed in its IT Charter.

entities.name: Système d’information et de communication
entities.description: SYSTRAN's internal information and communication system, which employees use for professional and personal purposes.

entities.name: Outils informatiques
entities.description: General IT tools provided by SYSTRAN to its employees, including portable equipment.

entities.name: Équipements portables
entities.description: Portable IT equipment made available by SYSTRAN to its employees.

entities.name: Matériels
entities.description: Hardware components provided by SYSTRAN for use within its IT system.

entities.name: Programmes
entities.description: Software programs provided by SYSTRAN for use within its IT system.

entities.name: Logiciels
entities.description: Software applications provided by SYSTRAN for use within its IT system.

entities.name: Progiciels
entities.description: Enterprise software packages provided by SYSTRAN for use within its IT system.

entities.name: Virus
entities.description: Malicious software that can disrupt IT systems, against which SYSTRAN's systems need protection.

entities.name: Chevaux de Troie
entities.description: Malicious software disguised as legitimate programs, against which SYSTRAN's systems need protection.

entities.name: Bombes logiques
entities.description: Malicious code designed to activate under specific conditions, against which SYSTRAN's systems need protection.
Network bandwidth, which SYSTRAN monitors and manages to prevent saturation from personal use.
